title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: In a workspace with many projects, when exporting a Zip file, the updating of checkboxes should use a busy cursor. This issue was observed on 01.10.2001 at 11:38:21.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with multiple projects, there is no busy cursor displayed during the updating of checkboxes.
EB: The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be displayed when updating the checkboxes during the Zip file export process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a workspace with multiple projects.
2. Go to the Export Zip option.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose some file types.
5. Press the 'OK' button.
